text: Ata'eba, tara ye sastiprapta hayechila, ta chila tadera'i angikara bhangara jan'ya ebam an'yayabhabe rasulaganake hatya karara karane ebam tadera e'i uktira daruna ye, amadera hrdaya acchanna. Abasya ta naya, baram kupharira karane sbayam allaha tadera antarera upara mohara emte diyechena. Phale era imana ane na kintu ati alpasankhyaka.
